location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1705: Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 9 April 1834, Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, writes to David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, acknowledging receipt of his letter, dated 7 October 1833, on the subject of the contest between the Sheik of Bahrain [Shaikh Khalīfah ibn Sulman Āl Khalīfah] and the Wahabee [Wahabi] chief. Norris states that the Governor in Council approves of Blane's proceedings as outlined in that letter.
